Text: A man walks down a dimly lit underground tunnel.
He stops at a door flanked by two soldiers.
The daughter of Baron Kagenou.
In here, Viscount Grease.

We've got her restrained, but she's extremely
hostile. Please proceed with caution.
Hmph. Who do you think I am?
M-My apologies, sir!

Grease pushes through the door and enters the stone
dungeon.
A girl is shackled to the wall with magic chains.

The man appears to be in his late thirties. He has a
piercing gaze and a well-built body, and his gray
hair is slicked back.
You must be Claire Kagenou.

When she's addressed by her name, the girl looks up
at Grease in response.

I've seen you around the capital. You're Viscount
Grease, aren't you?

Oh, well, I used to be a royal guard...or you saw me
at the Bushin Festival.
Hehe.

Right, the tournament. Princess Iris really tore you
a new one.

Hmph. We're bound by tournament rules, which makes it
an exception. I would never lose to her in a real battle.

You would lose then, too, Viscount Grease...
You first-round flunker.

Shut it. A brat will never know the struggles of
getting to the finals.
I'll make it in a year.

I hate to break it to you, but you don't have a year
left.

Haha... Which of us won't see another year? Why don't
we find out right here and now.

You won't be around long enough to find out, Claire
Kagenou. Your kind inevitably meets their end in a
place like this.
Claire howls with laughter.
Grease aims a kick at her face.
What, did I have a fly on my face?
Oh...? You managed to dodge my kick while shackled?

Hmph. I guess you're not letting your strong magical
powers overwhelm you.

I learned that it's all about how you use magic, not
how much.
Your father taught you well.

Baldy didn't teach me a thing. I'm talking about my
brother.
Your brother...?
...The cocky little rascal.

I win every time we battle, but I'm the one learning
from his techniques, not the other way around.
Which is why I make life hard for him.

My condolences to your brother. I guess this makes me
the hero who saves him from his wicked sister.
Enough chitchat...

Claire Kagenou, has your physical condition...felt
off recently?

As in, has it gotten harder to use and handle magic?
Have you experienced any pain when you use it? Is
your body starting to turn dark with rot? Do you
have any of these symptoms?
Did you abduct me to play doctor?

You know, I used to have a daughter. I have no desire
to resort to violent interrogation. Answering truthfully
will benefit us both.

Is that a threat? When I feel threatened, I tend to
get hostile...even when I shouldn't.
Are you saying you won't tell me the truth?
We'll see.

Fine. I'll answer your dumb question, since it's
irrelevant.

What was it? About my condition and magic, right?
Well, everything's fine now. If I wasn't chained up,
I'd be doing pretty darn good.
What do you mean by "now"?
Well, I first noticed the symptoms a year ago.
What? Are you saying it got curedon its own?

Grease has never heard of a case where "it" healed on
its own.

Yeah, I didn't do anything to... Oh, right. What was
it? A "stretch"?

I don't know what that means, but my little bro asked
me to stretch with him, and I felt better after that.
Stretch? I've never heard of that before...

In that case, I'll make sure to look into your
brother...
Wha?!

The chains binding her are no ordinary chains.
They're sealed with magic.

If you do anything to my brother, I'll never forgive
you!

Claire had unleashed the full extent of her physical
strength to slice the flesh off her hand, break her
own bones, and slide out of the chains to reach for
Grease.
You wretch...! You scraped off your own flesh...?!

I'll kill you, your loved ones, your family, your
friends...
Grease clobbers Claire in the gut with all his might.
...Ngh.

You brat... Well, then. I'll know whether you're
compatible once I've examined your blood.
Viscount Grease!
What is it?
Intruders!
What?!
Intruders?! Who the hell are they?
We don't know!

They number around seven, and appeared out of nowhere
like shadows, taking out one soldier after another.
We don't stand a chance without you!

Ugh, I'll take care of it! The rest of you, stay on
guard!
